name: WP Courseware for ConvertKit
author: Fly Plugins

sections.description:
Subscribe students to your list upon enrollment

Are you looking to subscribe your students to your email list? It’s now possible with the ConvertKit add-on for WP Courseware. Upon enrollment, you can subscribe your students to one of the following ConvertKit elements:

  • form(s)
  • sequence(s)
  • tag(s)

Create an online course lead magnet with webhooks

Webhooks are a super powerful method to take advantage of automation that will automatically enroll a student into a course when one of the following behaviors occur:

  • New Subscriber is added
  • Someone subscribes to a form
  • Someone is added to a sequence
  • Someone is tagged

Once you configure your ConvertKit API Key and Secret you can begin configuring your courses.

How to integrate WP Courseware and ConvertKit video tutorial

  • WP Courseware – The leading learning management system for WordPress. Create and sell online courses with a drag and drop interface. It’s that easy!
  • S3 Media Maestro – The most secure HTML 5 media player plugin for WordPress with full AWS (Amazon Web Services) S3 and CloudFront integration.

Minimum Requirements

  • PHP >= 5.6.2
  • WordPress >= 4.8.0
  • WP Courseware >= 4.6.1
sections.installation:
1. Go in to your WordPress Admin Panel.
  2. Navigate to Plugins → Add New and click upload.
  3. Browse for the wpcw-convertkit.zip file and click upload.
  4. Click Activate.
